sentences.en: a book on the history of British imperialism
sentences.cn: 一本关于英国帝国主义历史的书

sentences.en: As long as imperialism exists there will be soil for wars of aggression.
sentences.cn: 只要帝国主义还存在,就有发生侵略战争的土壤.

sentences.en: He set about rebuilding France, and made it into a brilliant - looking modernized imperialism.
sentences.cn: 他试图重建法国, 使它成为一项表面华丽的现代化帝业.

sentences.en: Imperialism has not been able to subjugate China.
sentences.cn: 帝国主义不能征服中国.

sentences.en: Imperialism is irretrievably on the decline.
sentences.cn: 帝国主义正在无可挽救地衰落下去.

sentences.en: Imperialism is monopolistic, parasitic and moribund capitalism.
sentences.cn: 帝国主义是垄断的 、 寄生的、垂死的资本主义.

sentences.en: Imperialism is the monopoly stage of capitalism.
sentences.cn: 帝国主义是资本主义的垄断阶段.

sentences.en: Might is right -- that is the logic of imperialism.
sentences.cn: 强权即公理 -- 这是帝国主义的逻辑.

sentences.en: More and more not have an easy time on the day of imperialism.
sentences.cn: 帝国主义的日子越来越不好过.

sentences.en: Our two peoples share the same experience of having been oppressed by imperialism.
sentences.cn: 我们两国人民都有遭受帝国主义压迫的共同经历.

sentences.en: Plunder is the very nature of imperialism.
sentences.cn: 帝国主义的本性就是掠夺.

sentences.en: Such international interest had to be free from any suspicion of economic imperialism.
sentences.cn: 这种国际上的关心必须毫无帝国主义经济的嫌疑.

sentences.en: The dark days when imperialism could carve up the world at will are gone for ever.
sentences.cn: 帝国主义可以任意瓜分世界的黑暗时代一去不复返了.

sentences.en: The oppressed peoples will never allow themselves to be preyed on by imperialism.
sentences.cn: 被压迫民族决不会听任帝国主义掠夺.

sentences.en: They held the imperialism in contempt.

words.tran_cn: 帝国的；皇帝的；至高无上的；威严的
帝国主义的；帝国主义者的；拥护帝国主义的
帝王般地；威严地；帝国地
皇位,帝制,王室,皇权,王冠

trans.tran_cn: 帝国主义，帝国主义政策
trans.tran_en: a political system in which one country rules a lot of other countries
